attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be a law, which pertains to any Police who are proven to be Racist in the line of duty, and when proven, they should immediately dismissed from the force without any references whatsoever

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
